channel.title: Experimental Forum of Lies 2 - Canned
channel.description:
## [color=skyblue]Welcome to Experimental Forum of Lies 2![/color] <small>Hosted by @Marluxion and @Twil1ight </small>
### [color=skyblue] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=skyblue] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 2 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998/) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=skyblue] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority is reached to accuse someone, that player will die. There will be no trials. Executions end the Day
# [color=gold]Special Experimental Changes[/color] 1. Trials have been removed. 2. Noble has been reworked. 3. The Kings have all been reworked. 4. Mastermind has been updated.
[details="New Noble Class Card"] ># [color=steblue]**The Noble**[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Pull Rank (Passive)** - When voting another player to become king, your votes are worth double. Does not work when voting for yourself. **Gossip (Night)** - Target a player and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - Infinite Uses > >_**They were successfully Investigated.**_ _**They were successfully Occupied.**_ _**Their target was successfully swapped.**_ > >**Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses _Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
>**Converts into [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] or [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color]** >[color=darkred]**Cult points: 2 - Each Ability Costs: 1**[/color]
[/details]
[details="New Aristocrat Class Card"] ># [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to become king count as two for you. **Pull Rank (Passive)** - When voting another player to become king, your votes are worth double. Does not work when voting for yourself. **Incriminate (Day)** - Slip a player forged documents, making them appear evil to investigations tonight. - Infinite uses **Gossip (Night)** - Target a player and learn if any and which of these things happens to them tonight. - Infinite Uses > >_**They were successfully Investigated.**_ _**They were successfully Occupied.**_ _**Their target was successfully swapped.**_ > >**Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._ [/details]
[details="New Apostle Class Card"] ># [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color] :crossed_swords: >[color=darkred]**Cult Social**[/color] **Dark Words (Passive)** - While you live, living and dead Cult members can communicate at night. **Eminence of Mithras (Day)** - At the end of the day, you will learn who voted for whom during today's king election. - 2 uses _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._ [/details]
[details="New Kings"] ># [color=steblue]The Good King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Special[/color]** **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. If you are executed for treason all players will lose their Royal Blood passive permanently. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 4 uses **Swear Fealty (Night)** - Make a player permanently immune to conversion. - 1 use (Starting King Only.) _Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
># [color=purple]The Evil King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Scheme (Night)** - Make the target player night immune and look not suspicious to The Sheriff tonight. - 2 uses (Starting King only) _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
># [color=darkred]The Devout King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >[color=darkred]**Cult Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two. This passive is disabled while there are 4 or less players alive. **Royal Pardon (Day)** - Make a player unable to be voted today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Execution **Royal Execution (Day)** -Target a player. That player will require 2 less votes to reach majority today. This will be publicly announced. - 1 use, shared with Royal Pardon **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Dark Gods Crown (Night)** - Select a dead Cultist and a living player. Depending on the Cultist's class a different effect will occur. Each corpse can only be used once. _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
>**Dark Gods Crown Effects:** Seeker - You learn of the players class type. Ritualist - You will prevent visits to the player. Invoker - The player will be occupied. Apostle - The player will be given incorrect feedback for their ability tonight. Cult Leader - The player will be framed. Devout King - Receive an extra Royal Pardon/Execution. [/details] (All Neutral Kings remain the same, just replace their Head of State / Decide Fate / Royal Pardon with the above Head of State / Royal Execution / Royal Pardon)
[details="New Mastermind"] ># [color=purple]The Mastermind[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: >**[color=purple]Unseen Special[/color]** **Can't Touch This (Passive)** - Immune to death at night, occupation and target changing. Occupations and target changes on you will appear successful and You will know if someone tries to occupy you or change your target. **Lurking Presence (Passive)** - You will appear to be a Blue Dragon Investigative class to investigations for the first 3 nights. When you die, the Starting Assassin will take your place if they are still alive. **Dirty Work (Day)** If there are no more Unseen members left, you can become The Assassin at the beginning of the night. - 1 use **Convert (Night)** - Change target player into the Unseen version of their class. If you have failed to convert a target twice already and your next conversion would fail it will instead target a random convertible player. - Infinite uses, 1 night cooldown **Foresight (Night)** - Determine a player’s converted class type, or if they cannot be converted. - 4 uses _Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._ [/details]
### [color=skyblue] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=skyblue] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=skyblue]Players: [/color] 1. Pug 2. PoisonedSquid 3. Frostwolf103 4. Geyde 5. Alice 6. Insanity 7. Zone_Q11 8. Isaac_Gonzalez 9. [color=steblue]Psychoneirik :crown: - The Good King - Died n2[/color] 10. WazzaAzza 11. [color=steblue]Firekitten - The Prince - Died n1[/color] 12. MaximusPrime 13. [color=purple]H_Hjasik - The Mastermind - Lynched d2[/color] 14. Astand 15. [color=steblue]xtxownage - The Butler - Died n2[/color] 16. Margaret
Backups: MaximusPrime, Kai_5
# Shortcuts [**Start of Game**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-day-1-16-16-alive/75081/246?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-2-day-2-15-16-alive/75081/370?u=marluxion)

item.title: Experimental Forum of Lies 2 - Canned
item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
astand:

The game was canned because the host decided to leave the forum.

Ouch. That was sudden.

astand:

Not sure what do you mean by witch (I assume Warlock), but no one would be notified.

Not quite… I was talking about ToS, I guess.
Thanks for answering!

Read full topic

Hey. Why is the game canned?

Also, if a witch visits the jailor’s target, will the jailor and their target (i.e. the jailed one) get notified of this?

item.description:

am i just dumb?

how was zone redirected

Emilia:

I was a fool

Emilia:

So everyone Who voted me got self redirected

MaximusPrime:

oh

i didn’t know that

So there WAS the possibility.
…yep. Still mad.

item.title: Experimental Forum of Lies 2 - Canned
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
A co-host is not always willing to step up to host a whole game plus finding replacement hosts is not an easy thing to do. Especially when only certain people are authorized to host FoL’s I believe.

In reality, Marl probably wanted to make a statement however.

Read full topic
